parameters.name: All
parameters.description:
Whether to untag all tags on the instance. This parameter is only effective when TagKey.N is not set in the request. The value range is:

- true
- false

Default value: false

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: Region ID, you can view available region IDs through the [DescribeRegions](~~86912~~) interface.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
Resource type. The value range is:
- `instance`: Reserved mode instance.
- `ALIYUN::GPDB::INSTANCE`: Elastic mode instance.

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description: Resource tag key. N's value range: 1~20
